about_the_game:
Robotica is a first-person shooter, wave defense, survival game, with tower defense, base building, and fortifications elements! Defend a sentient being known as, “The Tower”, from endless waves of corrupt robotic organisms that exist purely to cause destruction. As you progress through the waves of enemies, you will encounter grace periods where you are allowed to upgrade your characters abilities, your available weapons, and build fortifications and turrets! The faster you complete waves, the more you are rewarded by The Tower! How long can you survive?

Make sure you join the discord.
